verses.verse: Now <S%H1162>Boaz<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> <S%H5927>up<s%> to the <S%H8179>gate,<s%> and sat <S%H3427>down<s%> <S%H1350>there.<s%> Behold, the near kinsman of whom <S%H1162>Boaz<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H5674>came<s%> <S%H6423>by;<s%> to whom he <S%H1696>said,<s%> <S%H5674>"Come<s%> over <S%H5493>here,<s%> <S%H1945>friend,<s%> and sit <S%H3427>down!<s%>" He turned <S%H5493>aside,<s%> and sat <S%H3427>down.<s%>
He <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> of the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "Sit <S%H3427>down<s%> <S%H3427>here.<s%>" They sat down.

He <S%H559>said<s%> to the near <S%H1350>kinsman,<s%> <S%H5281>"Naomi,<s%> who has come <S%H7725>back<s%> out of the <S%H7704>country<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> is <S%H4376>selling<s%> the <S%H2513>parcel<s%> of <S%H7704>land,<s%> which was our <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H458>Elimelech<s%>'s.

I <S%H559>thought<s%> to <S%H1540>disclose<s%> it to <S%H559>you,<s%> saying, <S%H7069><s%> 'Buy it before <S%H3427>those<s%> who sit <S%H2205>here,<s%> and before the elders of my <S%H5971>people.<s%>' If you will <S%H1350>redeem<s%> <S%H1350>it,<s%> redeem <S%H1350>it;<s%> but if you will not redeem <S%H5046>it,<s%> then tell <S%H3045>me,<s%> that I may know. For there is no one to <S%H1350>redeem<s%> it <S%H2108>besides<s%> <S%H310>you;<s%> and I am after <S%H559>you.<s%>" He said, "I will redeem <S%H1350>it.<s%>"

Then <S%H1162>Boaz<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "On the <S%H3117>day<s%> you <S%H7069>buy<s%> the <S%H7704>field<s%> from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H5281>Naomi,<s%> you must <S%H7069>buy<s%> it also from <S%H7327>the<s%> <S%H4125>Moabitess,<s%> the <S%H802>wife<s%> of the <S%H4191>dead,<s%> to raise <S%H6965>up<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H4191>dead<s%> on his <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%>"

The near <S%H1350>kinsman<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "I <S%H3201>can't<s%> <S%H1350>redeem<s%> it for <S%H7843>myself,<s%> lest I mar my own <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%> <S%H1350>Take<s%> my <S%H1353>right<s%> of redemption for <S%H3201>yourself;<s%> for I can't redeem <S%H1350>it.<s%>"

Now this was the custom in former <S%H6440>time<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%> concerning <S%H1353>redeeming<s%> and concerning <S%H8545>exchanging,<s%> to <S%H6965>confirm<s%> all <S%H1697>things:<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> took <S%H8025>off<s%> his <S%H5275>shoe,<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> it to his <S%H7453>neighbor;<s%> and this was the way of <S%H8584>attestation<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
So the near <S%H1350>kinsman<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1162>Boaz,<s%> <S%H7069>"Buy<s%> it for <S%H8025>yourself.<s%>" He took off his <S%H5275>shoe.<s%>

<S%H1162>Boaz<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H2205>elders,<s%> and to all the <S%H5971>people,<s%> "You are <S%H5707>witnesses<s%> this <S%H3117>day,<s%> that I have <S%H7069>bought<s%> all that was <S%H458>Elimelech<s%>'s, and all that was <S%H3630>Chilion<s%>'s and <S%H4248>Mahlon<s%>'s, from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H5281>Naomi.<s%>

Moreover <S%H7327>the<s%> <S%H4125>Moabitess,<s%> the <S%H802>wife<s%> of <S%H4248>Mahlon,<s%> I have <S%H7069>purchased<s%> to be my <S%H802>wife,<s%> to raise <S%H6965>up<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H4191>dead<s%> on his <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> that the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H4191>dead<s%> not be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from <S%H5973>among<s%> his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> and from the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of his <S%H4725>place.<s%> You are <S%H5707>witnesses<s%> this <S%H3117>day.<s%>"

All the <S%H5971>people<s%> who were in the <S%H8179>gate,<s%> and the <S%H2205>elders,<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "We are <S%H5707>witnesses.<s%> May <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5414>make<s%> the <S%H802>woman<s%> who has <S%H935>come<s%> into your <S%H1004>house<s%> like <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> and like <S%H3812>Leah,<s%> which <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and <S%H6213>treat<s%> you <S%H2428>worthily<s%> in <S%H672>Ephrathah,<s%> and be <S%H7121>famous<s%> in <S%H1035>Bethlehem.<s%>

Let your <S%H1004>house<s%> be like the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H6557>Perez,<s%> whom <S%H8559>Tamar<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> to <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> of the <S%H2233>seed<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> shall <S%H5414>give<s%> you of this young <S%H5291>woman.<s%>"

So <S%H1162>Boaz<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H7327>Ruth,<s%> and she became his <S%H802>wife;<s%> and he went <S%H935>in<s%> to <S%H3068>her,<s%> and Yahweh <S%H5414>gave<s%> her <S%H2032>conception,<s%> and she <S%H3205>bore<s%> a <S%H1121>son.<s%>

The <S%H802>women<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H5281>Naomi,<s%> <S%H1288>"Blessed<s%> be <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> who has not <S%H7673>left<s%> you this <S%H3117>day<s%> without a near <S%H1350>kinsman;<s%> and let his <S%H8034>name<s%> be <S%H7121>famous<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

He shall be to you a <S%H7725>restorer<s%> of <S%H5315>life,<s%> and <S%H3557>sustain<s%> you in your old <S%H7872>age,<s%> for your <S%H3618>daughter-in<s%>-law, who <S%H157>loves<s%> <S%H2896>you,<s%> who is better to you than <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H1121>sons,<s%> has borne <S%H3205>him.<s%>"
<S%H5281>Naomi<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H3206>child,<s%> and <S%H7896>laid<s%> it in her <S%H2436>bosom,<s%> and became nurse to <S%H539>it.<s%>

The <S%H7934>women,<s%> her neighbors, <S%H7121>gave<s%> him a <S%H8034>name,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "There is a <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H3205>born<s%> to <S%H5281>Naomi;<s%>" and they <S%H8034>named<s%> <S%H8034>him<s%> <S%H5744>Obed.<s%> He is the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H3448>Jesse,<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%>
Now this is the history of the <S%H8435>generations<s%> of <S%H6557>Perez:<s%> <S%H6557>Perez<s%> became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H2696>Hezron,<s%>
and <S%H2696>Hezron<s%> became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H7410>Ram,<s%> and <S%H7410>Ram<s%> became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H5992>Amminadab,<s%>
and <S%H5992>Amminadab<s%> became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H5177>Nahshon,<s%> and <S%H5177>Nahshon<s%> became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H8009>Salmon,<s%>
and <S%H8012>Salmon<s%> became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H1162>Boaz,<s%> and <S%H1162>Boaz<s%> became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H5744>Obed,<s%>
and <S%H5744>Obed<s%> became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H3448>Jesse,<s%> and <S%H3448>Jesse<s%> became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%>
